website_summaries.verdict: AMMSUN’s adjustable patio umbrella does double duty as a featherweight and portable beach umbrella as well, but we highly recommend investing in a sand anchor if you take this model to the seaside.
pros: Available in blue and teal colors
cons: Does not include an umbrella base or sand anchor

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! Held up in the wind and is well built
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased with this purchase. I ordered this umbrella to use for a few beach trips. The carrying bag made it easy to carry around, was very easy to setup, and is well built and durable. It got pretty windy at times where other people’s umbrellas were flying around and this umbrella didn’t even come close to going anywhere. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good price but bad design
customer_reviews.text: Slots on top are too tight and air does not flow thru so when the wind blows at the beach, the umbrella launches like a kite ;-((
customer_reviews.author: Laurie H.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this umbrella. Unfortunately upon opening it up my excitement disappeared. All of the inside edges are unfinished with rough cuts and loose threads and areas with stiches have small holes in them. I'm really bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this beach umbrella because of positive reviews and the size. While the size turns to be great to have two chairs under it, two of the beach umbrella's metal wires that connect to the umbrella fabric broke after a month's use. I currently have them rigged to connect with safety pins. Not sure how long that will work. I know that umbrellas should last for years, as I am also using a smaller one that I bought on Amazon more than five years ago. This one simply isn't well made.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Not for high wind areas.
customer_reviews.text: A non-essential part, the top cap, arrived broken and unusable. The design of this umbrella is more like a handheld rain umbrella and the wind - instead of flowing though it - tossed it around the beach a few times. 3 stars because I was finally able to place the anchor screw - purchased seperatly - and pole far enough down in the sand (almost 2 feet) that the umbrella didnt launch into the air at the slightest breeze. In looking around the beach at the other umbrellas, this one was definitely moving around more in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Bunnie

customer_reviews.title: Certainly didn't look heavy duty. Umbrella kept blowing inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Certainly didn't look heavy duty. Umbrella kept blowing inside out when it got really windy. Didn't break though so maybe it was suppose to as a precaution.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D. Miner

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella based on other reviews that were quite good. From the first time at the beach we've been having to manage this umbrella. We bought it in the beginning of the season and now it's headed for the trash can as one of the spokes broke.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dahlheimer

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest Umbrella on the Beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella over a year ago and waited to review it until I saw how durable it is. I absolutely love this umbrella. It is so pretty. I love the flower on the on the top. The size is good for two people but not so big that a strong breeze doesn't tip it over. My brother's umbrella broke in the wind, but this one did well. I did tie string to it and steak it to the beach. I liked this so much that I plan to buy another one to replace this one because nothing lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Carton

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick! I go to the beach solo most of the time, so it’s perfect for just me...would be tight if trying to fit two people under the shade. I got the teal color and it is beautiful... I’ve used it probably 10 times and it looks brand new. I’d recommend buying an anchor to screw the umbrella into the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Church

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella for taking to the park
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this umbrella for almost two years and it has held up really well for using in the backyard or taking to the park. It’s not something that is up constantly, but has held up really well. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: We took it on vacation to Texas last week. It SUCKED, I bought a $15 umbrella from Target last year and it worked better than this. I would not recommend to anyone going to a place that is kind of windy. The umbrella flipped inside out in us over 4 times be we tried tilting it. I would buy something else instead if this product! The cut outs on top are supposed to help with the wind, and they don't. Also could tell it's cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella, but poorly designed - center knob falls off and now missing
customer_reviews.text: I really like /liked this umbrella, but the center knob on the main white poll used to tighten the height continually fell off ....we kept finding it lose it the bag and now it has finally disappeared after only 6 uses. I have tried to find a way to order a replacement part and there is nothing online and the AMMSUN website is not user friend at all - haven't heard back. I have past the amazon return date and now I am getting frustrated as the umbrella has become worthless....
customer_reviews.author: heather h

customer_reviews.title: but it's cute and a good umbrella. Get an anchor - it really helped
customer_reviews.text: The edging around the white petals on the underside of the umbrella is a little shaggy, but it's cute and a good umbrella. Get an anchor - it really helped.
customer_reviews.author: LISA RAVEN

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to two beaches. This umbrella was the only one that withstood some major winds. This is a must buy. We ended up buying another because it’s so well made. The only con is the carrying bag snags.
customer_reviews.author: HLJAAEJEJH

customer_reviews.title: Not well made for any wind
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of this umbrella, but after only a few uses, it is falling apart. The topper came off, spokes have come free from the material, and the latch for opening and closing has rusted!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann C. Bender

customer_reviews.title: made well ..,.except
customer_reviews.text: i love the product but wish the pivot hinge was better in the wind it flops back and forth about 30' degrees each way . very irritating .
customer_reviews.author: dadfisher

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella so much I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: My first, we have used for 3 summers and it is still in great shape. Bought a second for full shade coverage for the 4 adults on our beach trip this summer. It holds up really well in the high beach winds- I recommend buying an anchor to best hold in sand.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good in the short term, but not for serious use.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this umbrella for a few months and thought it was a great deal for the price. It withstood wind very well, although I use an umbrella anchor. I used it around 10 times before the screw that holds the top part from the bottom came loose and fell out while I was trying to close it after a day at the beach. I am going to try and fix it, but I do not have high hopes. I would not recommend for long-term or serious use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use on our boat so t works great it tilts and rotates with in a bracket that was built for it so now I can fish without getting to hot!
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn Frith

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this umbrella. It’s super cute, slightly different than everyone else’s. Screws in easily. Held up at many days at the beach. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kkskids

customer_reviews.title: Lights don’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Only to stars because the lights didn’t last long and can’t be fixed. Quality of fabric is good.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! Its pretty, light, easy to carry and great quality. I have only used it with the extra screw thing that you place at the end (sorry this sounds like a child writing it but can't remember what those things are called), which is needed on a windy Malibu beach.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa matsson

customer_reviews.title: One of the best out there!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely color and easy to set up. Wish I bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brown

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE UMBRELLA
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this due to the attractive color and design. We love it. The only downside is it doesn’t dig into the sand as well as the Costco umbrellas, but it works great and is pretty. It provides enough shade and seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: LPark

customer_reviews.title: A Stunning Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Stunning, Very Well Made Umbrella! Everything about this is beautiful. I used this on my Ice Cream Cart for a Mother’s Day Tea and had a ton of compliments. The color is vivid and stitching straight and consistent. Trust me, you and your guests will love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The top part of the umbrella was nowhere to be found
customer_reviews.author: April Danielle Española

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this umbrella. It's very well made and beautiful. Worth every penny. I used to buy cheap beach umbrella and they consistently broke, replacing those each year is more than this umbrella so it pays for itself!
customer_reviews.author: N4th4li3

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Used this at the beach very study. And covered 2 adults and 2 children kept them in the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: sturdy/ hard to bury
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella held up well when the wind grabbed it at the beach this weekend only down fall is that it is not pointed on the bottom to make it easy to push into the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Kallie Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Only used umbrella twice!!
customer_reviews.text: The second time we used this umbrella it broke while we were putting it down to leave the beach. Tried to fix it this morning . We were lowering the umbrella down & another tine broke! It’s cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: used once and trim is fraying.
customer_reviews.text: Used once and the trim around the flower pattern is already fraying. really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: amc

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Holds up great! For the price I didnt expect much to be honest but I was pleasantly surprised! It's a very nice color and held up to some strong winds at the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Ward

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used this umbrella at a music festival and it provided great shade...and protected me from 2 rain storms.
customer_reviews.author: CathyG

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality easy to carry and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Decent size. quality material, not too heavy to carry to the beach, cover shade for pleasant day at sunny beach. Love it. and... beautiful design and color.
customer_reviews.author: j'aimelire

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and doesnt break down from the wind!
customer_reviews.author: ivy stafford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful beach umbrella that can withstand strong winds
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that withstood 10 to 20 mile an hour wind gusts at the beach and looked beautiful very different from everybody else’s beach store purchased umbrellas
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chesley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is amazing!!!! This is the perfect umbrella. I have it out by the pool and we get a lot of wind, very sturdy and great to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this umbrella, it was perfect for our Florida trip and our lake days. Good price and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, yet lightweight. The design is beautiful and different, making it easy to spot on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: hopey1kanopey

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and easy to spot from the water
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is different than all the others on the beach. Very bright and easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: L Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy for the beach. We didn’t have any issues. Definite must for beaching with babies.
customer_reviews.author: dlschess

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella but when I went to close it up it wouldn't come down. I contacted the supplier as instructed three times, each time they replied that they would contact me within a couple of business days so far two months later nothing,
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Havn't used yet...
customer_reviews.text: but I did unpack and extend and it looks like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Great beach umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Great size to fit two people comfortably. Good quality and held up well with the wind.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella in the wind
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is a generous size. It stays steady when every other umbrella on the beach is turning inside out. The only downside would be that it needs an extra purchase. A sand anchor really helps to keep it anchored in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Klemp

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Blew inside out the first day we used it and was ruined. The wind was not even that strong.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy! A little bit heavier but that's probably why it withstands the wind!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds up against the wind.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice beach umbrella. Holds up pretty well to the wind. The color is attractive too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Heavel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The top part of the umbrella would not stay up. The tightening bar would not tighten enough to keep the umbarella up so it would keep sliding down into the tube.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great look. All in all
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised. It was sturdier than I expected. Great look. All in all, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella. It’s very sturdy and i like the telescoping feature. If it gets too windy you can lower the umbrella down closer to the sand!
customer_reviews.author: janet m mooney

customer_reviews.title: Great in the wind, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is great in the wind. On the windy beaches of Hawaii, this umbrella holds form great while all other umbrellas on the beach are wilting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Poorly constructed. Points where fabric is attached to frame were separating, ripping. Not recommended. Product was returned.
customer_reviews.author: V. Negron

customer_reviews.title: Great on a windy day
customer_reviews.text: Used the umbrella at a windy beach and it held up very well. Durable and great looking.
customer_reviews.author: Helen E

customer_reviews.title: The vented panels allow wind to pass thru so it don't blow over as easy.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The vented panels allow wind to pass thru so it don't blow over as easy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reicherts

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Good quality, very adjustable, so during all day you can have a shadow on one place))
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed om
customer_reviews.text: Never had a chance to use this but it looked good
customer_reviews.author: Amy Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Light to carry. Nice size for multiple people at the beach. Love the directional tilt to block sun and wind.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Perfect size. Quick and easy to put up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Held up great for our OBX trip. Didnt move in the wind. Needs an anchor bought separately.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Have only used once, so far. Prettiest one on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first couple of uses!
customer_reviews.text: The spring and pin hardware on this umbrella broke and failed after the first couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Has held up in wind. I am using as a patio umbrella & it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Riley

customer_reviews.title: Disappoonted
customer_reviews.text: Two destroyed within one month, poorly sewn at the canbas
customer_reviews.author: On the bay

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Going to the beach this weekend. Looking forward to using this. Love the color, love the size!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is cute but definitely just for one person
customer_reviews.author: Cathy G.

customer_reviews.title: great so far for the price
customer_reviews.text: great so far for the price. The fabric is sturdy and it looks great on a small outdoor table that seats 4!
customer_reviews.author: andrea wasser

product_meta.title: AMMSUN 7ft Beach Umbrella with Tilt Telescopic Pole and UPF 100+, Flower Vents Design and Portable Sun Shelter for Sand and Outdoor Activities, Carry Bag and Without Sand Anchor Teal/White
feature_bullets: 100% UV Protection: Umbrella cloth is made of Polyester which can give you up to UPF 100+ protection, and block harmful radiation. Don't be afraid of scorching sun on the beach, it will give your skin thoughtful protection.

Flower Design Air Vent: Vent on the top is designed to promotes air flow, allow for the umbrella to combat high winds, it will be more stable. The flower design is unique and elegant, you will be a highlight on the beach with it.

Tilted Device Design: The tilting mechanism allows you to easily and quickly adjust the canopy, and away from the sunlight without moving beach umbrella, you can enjoy coolness shade from sunrise to sunset.

Sturdy And Stable Frame: 1.26 inch Steel pole, 10 umbrella ribs and solid sand anchor make the large umbrella more sturdy and stable, you don't worry about that umbrella is blown away by the wind, and will enjoy a good time on the beach!

Portable bag included: It can be efficiently disassembled and stowed away quickly, you can put the beach umbrella into the carry bag , and bring it anywhere without burden. Suitable for all kinds of occasions, such as the patio, beach parties, picnics, and camping.Optional Sand Anchor device ASIN:B01EHMC9EQ (sold separately) is recommended. It's built to hold your umbrellas steady.For any possible questions, contact us via support@ammsun.com

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
